CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 6, 1952, pg. 2, reads: "5,000 Negroes Used Highland Park Pool This Year - Democracy in Action - These youngsters are enjoying the recreation at Highland Park Pool, where in this summer, for the first time since the pool was built, the pool could be used freely by all citizens of Pittsburgh. The official count showed that 5,078 Negroes used the pool up to the end of last week. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Children in Highland Park swimming pool with three girls wearing bathing caps in foreground
